text.text: Abilities are powerful modifiers that drastically change a tool. Modifiers such as silk touch and autosmelt are notable as both change the effects of mining blocks, while dual wielding makes tools much easier to handle.
Abilities require ability slots to be applied. Nearly all tools start with a single ability slot, and can only receive up to 1 more, so choose abilities wisely.
Thruul M'Gon's Mighty Smelting has a full list of abilities available on tools, along with the Encyclopedia of Tinkering.
